mapper.insert: INSERT INTO phe_pham (ma_lo, so_luong, ngay_phe_pham,ly_do,sys_id_san_pham) VALUES ( #{maLo}, #{soLuong},NOW(),#{lyDo},#{sysIdSanPham});
mapper.select: SELECT p.ma_lo, p.so_luong, p.ngay_phe_pham, p.id, p.ly_do, ton_kho.sys_id_san_pham, san_pham.ten_san_pham FROM phe_pham p JOIN ton_kho ON p.sys_id_san_pham = ton_kho.sys_id_san_pham JOIN san_pham ON ton_kho.sys_id_san_pham = san_pham.sys_id_san_pham GROUP BY p.ma_lo, p.so_luong, p.ngay_phe_pham, p.id, p.ly_do, ton_kho.sys_id_san_pham, san_pham.ten_san_pham;

SELECT p.ngay_phe_pham, sp.ten_san_pham, SUM(IFNULL(p.so_luong, 0)) AS so_luong, p.ma_lo FROM phe_pham p INNER JOIN san_pham sp ON p.sys_id_san_pham = sp.sys_id_san_pham WHERE WEEK(p.ngay_phe_pham) = WEEK(CURRENT_DATE) AND YEAR(p.ngay_phe_pham) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY p.ngay_phe_pham, sp.ten_san_pham, p.ma_lo ORDER BY p.ngay_phe_pham;
